price: 14. Kaadu firqawnaa kee firqawni mari dambi yot-le num keenik qideeh, woo caneh yoo qidaanamak meesita iyye Nabii Muusa.
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
